file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 28-41-01-05 - FUEL CONDITIONING UNIT (FCU) - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FUEL CONDITIONING UNIT (FCU) - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the test of the wing Fuel Conditioning Unit (FCU). B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FUEL CONDITIONING UNIT - FUNCTION- ALL 28-41-01-700-801-A ♦ AL TEST EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 28-41-01 Page 1 of 2 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 28-41-01-700-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FUEL CONDITIONING UNIT - FUNCTIONAL TEST A. General (1) To do the test, it is necessary to remove the Fuel Conditioning Unit from the aircraft. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 28-41-01/400 - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 221 221GF Cockpit D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the wing Fuel Conditioning Unit ( AMM MPP 28-41-01/400). J. Functionally Check Fuel Conditioning Unit SUBTASK 720-002-A (1) Do the functionally check of the Fuel Conditioning Unit safe-life features. Refer to the latest revision of Parker Aerospace CMM for FCU. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the wing Fuel Conditioning Unit ( AMM MPP 28-41-01/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 28-41-01 Page 2 of 2 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
